name: Santa The Spine Breaker
description:
Santa The Spine Breaker is a short game made under 3 days for the Jame Gam Christmas Edition Game Jam!

Help Santa free all the adults that the naught children are holding hostage by, say it with me now, breaking their spines!

Controlls:

-Right click to move

-Left click to shoot

- 1, 2 and 3 to cycle through your weapons
